# ES6 ANTLR Calculator Demo
* Generated by ChatGPT
* Adpated and extended  by loriacarlos@gmail 


## Prompt (Spanish)
``` Necesito que me generes un demo tipo calculadora que pueda correr en ES6 que corra en node usando ANTLR4```

## Requires JDK >= 8

## Requieres antlr-4.13.2-complete.jar en dir lib

## Project structure
```
./
├─ package.json
├─ README.md  
├─ lib/
│  └─ antlr-4.13.2-complete.jar        
├─ grammar/
│  └─ Expr.g4
├─ generated/                          
├─ src/
│  ├─ EvalVisitor.js
│  └─ main.js
└─ examples/
   └─ test.expresso
```

## Init projecto

``` npm i ```

## Build 
```npm run build  ```

## Testing (Windows)
To run on project's root:

### parses some (in code wired) expression and shows its corresponding AST
``` node src\convertToAST.mjs ```

### parses and evaluates an expresso file at dir examples 
``` node src\parseEvaluate.mjs examples\test.expresso```

### A repl that simulates a shell for expresso. Exit with .exit or CTRL-C
``` node src\repl.mjs ```
